702174f-a.title: Bronx: Whitlock Avenue - Lowell Street
702174f-a.text:
Whitlock Ave. (extreme left), east side, north from Lowell Street
to Westchester Ave., showing the buildings of the Metropolitan Swimming
Pool (the pool itself is directly below the buildings and is not seen
in the view). On the right appears the Bronx River and the bridge of the
I.R.T. Pelham Bay Park subway line. The vantage point is the Whitlock
Ave. elevated station of the subway line.
July 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO RRPRODUCTIONS.
